Help Buzzy Bee get back home to his hive

It's not easy being a bee. Even getting back home after a hard day's work pollinating flowers can be filled with danger. Help Buzzy to safely reach his hive by avoiding predatory birds and walls that appear suddenly from nowhere, and make sure you don't run out of time!

Use Arrow Keys to make Buzzy go up, down, forwards, and back

Game Over

Congratulations, you won!
